code: import React from'react';import PopupNotification from'./PopupNotification';import{usePopupNotification}from'../../contexts/PopupNotificationContext';import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PopupNotificationContainer=()=>{const{notifications,removeNotification}=usePopupNotification();console.log('ðŸŽ¨ PopupNotificationContainer render:',{notificationsCount:notifications.length,notifications:notifications,hasNotifications:notifications.length>0});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:notifications.map(notification=>{console.log('ðŸŽ­ Rendering popup notification:',notification);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PopupNotification,{notification:notification,onClose:()=>removeNotification(notification.id)},notification.id);})});};export default PopupNotificationContainer;
